== Sparklines

A library for generating small sparkline graphs from Ruby. Use it in desktop apps or with Ruby on Rails. 

== Source

http://github.com/topfunky/sparklines

== Other info

http://nubyonrails.com/pages/sparklines

== Authors

Geoffrey Grosenbach
boss@topfunky.com
http://nubyonrails.com/pages/sparklines

Daniel Nugent
nugend@gmail.com
